article_title: STLMoms: What to expect the first year
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

(STLMoms)- We are all familiar with the go too book for expecting mothers , but what happens after that ?

Author Heidi Murkoff shares a glance overview of what to expect from your growing baby.

Her book "What to Expect the First Year," truly gives the first time parent an easy read, one baby step at a time.

For additional information visit: whattoexpect.com
